citation: Proclamation under the Stolen Generations of Aboriginal Children Act 2006 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Stolen Generations of Aboriginal Children Act 2006

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Stolen Generations of Aboriginal Children Act 2006 fix 15 January 2007 as the day on which that Act commences.

20 December 2006

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

MICHELLE O'BYRNE

Minister for Community Development

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 December 2006

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
